structure.unit: ARTICLE XIX. GENDER PRICE DISCRIMINATION ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 8A-401. Definitions.
shall mean an individual who inquires about, makes a request for, or purchases a good or service.
shall mean Miami-Dade County's Consumer Services Department or its successor department.
shall mean the Director of Miami-Dade County's Consumer Services Department or its successor department.
shall mean any individual, business, company, corporation, partnership, sole proprietorship, association, professional association, firm, store, shop, establishment, service, place or building which offers, sells or otherwise makes available to the public any good or service.
